name: SearchEmail
description: This API searches for emails matching given criteria.

parameters.name: read/unread
parameters.description: Search only read or unread emails. "read" (only search for read emails) or "unread" (only search for unread emails) or "both" (no limit).

parameters.name: from_time
parameters.description: The earliest receipt date. Format: "YYYY-MM-DD". Can be empty (null), indicating no limit.

parameters.name: to_time
parameters.description: The latest receipt date. Format: "YYYY-MM-DD". Can be empty (null), indicating no limit.

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: Keywords that emails must contain. Can be empty (null), indicating no keyword.
